quiz.text: Rashtriya Poshan Maah is organized by which of the following Ministries?
options: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
Ministry of Food Processing Industries
Ministry of Rural Development

quiz.text: Which of the following is the main theme of 6th Rashtriya Poshan Maah?
options: Mahila aur Swasthya
Bacha aur Shiksha
Poshan Bhi Padhai Bhi
Yoga and AYUSH for Nutrition
Suposhit Bharat, Sakshar Bharat, Sashakt Bharat

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), the Ministry of Ayush has co-hosted the First Global Summit on Traditional Medicine under the theme 'Towards Health and Well-being for All'. The outcome document of the First Global Summit on Traditional Medicine reaffirmed global commitments towards indigenous knowledges, biodiversity and traditional, complementary and integrative medicine. It will focus on the integration of traditional medicines in national health systems and help unlock the power of traditional medicine.What is the name of the outcome document of the First Global Summit on Traditional Medicine.
options: Mumbai Declaration
Assam Declaration
Gujarat Declaration
Delhi Declaration
Goa Declaration

quiz.text: According to latest data released by the Ministry of Finance, the gross Goods and Services Tax (GST) revenue collected in the month of August, 2023 is Rs 1,59,069 crore.  As per the data, which of the following states/UTs registered Maximum Y-o-Y growth of GST Revenue in August, 2023?
options: Tripura
Haryana
Nagaland
Goa
Gujarat

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the University Grants Commission (UGC), in association with the Ministry of Education has launched the Malaviya Mission - Teacher Training Programme. Which of the following statements are correct regarding the Programmea) The programme will be implemented across 111 Malaviya Mission centres across India.b) The programme will focus on capacity building of 15 lakh teachers in higher educational institutions.c) The programme comprises 10 themes
options: Only a
only b
both a and b
both a and c
both b and c

quiz.text: Identify ‘X’ using the following statementsa) ‘X’ has been recently awarded the status of a Deemed-to-be-University.b) ‘X’ was established in 1961 to assist Central and State Governments on policies and programmes for qualitative improvement in school education
options: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)
Central Institute of Education Technology (CIET)
National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE)
All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE)
University Grants Commission (UGC)

quiz.text: The Framework for Revival and Rehabilitation of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises is applicable to all MSMEs having loan limits upto _____.
options: Rs 50 crores
Rs 30 crores
Rs 10 crores
Rs.25 crores
Rs 45 crores

quiz.text: India and the United Kingdom (UK) launched the UK-India FTA negotiations in 2022. Recently the twelfth round of negotiations for the United Kingdom (UK)-India Free Trade Agreement (FTA) took place. The FTA is expected to facilitate the target of doubling bilateral trade between India and UK by _____.
options: 2027
2024
2025
2026
2030

quiz.text: Which of the following statements are correct with respect to Project AMBER?a) The Project is co-funded by the Ministry of Labour and Employmentb) The Project is implemented under SANKALP Programmec) The Project aims to train 30,000 youth, 50% of whom will be women.
options: only a
only b
only c
only and b
only b and c

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), the Union Ministry of Tourism, in collaboration with the United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO), unveiled the G20 Tourism and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) Dashboard. The dashboard consolidates the GOA Roadmap. The GOA Roadmap for Tourism as a Vehicle for Achieving the Sustainable Development Goals is built around five priority areas. Which of the following is not one of the five priority area of GOA Roadmap?
options: Green Tourism
Destination Management
MICE Tourism
Digitalization
Skills

quiz.text: Which of the following statement are correct regarding Adopt a Heritage 2.0 programme?a) The programme is launched by Archaeological Survey of India (ASI)b) Under the programme, ASI invites corporate stakeholders to enhance the amenities at the monuments by utilizing their Corporate social responsibility (CSR) funds.c) The selected stakeholders will develop, provide and maintain amenities in hygiene, accessibility, safety and knowledge categories.
options: only a)
only b)
only c)
both a and b
All statements are correct

quiz.text: Union Minister for Education and Skill Development & Entrepreneurship recently (September 2023) launched a 3-year partnership with ________, “Education to Entrepreneurship: Empowering a generation of students, educators and entrepreneurs”.
options: Alphabet
UNESCO
Meta
Aadhaarstambh Education and Skill Development Foundation
STEP Skill Development Foundation

quiz.text: Recently a conference on "Green Hydrogen Pilots in India" was held by ________ in New Delhi to showcase various Green Hydrogen Pilots being implemented by both public and private sector companies of India.
options: Power Finance Corporation Ltd.
Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency Ltd. (IREDA)
NTPC Ltd.
Energy Efficiency Services Limited
None of the above

quiz.text: Minister for Rural Development and Panchayati Raj recently (September 2023) chaired National Conclave on Enabling 2 Crore ‘LAKHPATI DIDIs’. The conclave was organised by _______ in New Delhi.
options: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana- National Rural Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NRLM)
NABARD
National Institute of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj
Training to Rural Youth for Self Employment (TRYSEM)
None of the above

quiz.text: During the G20 Summit in New Delhi, a ‘Digital India Experience Zone’ set up to showcase the India’s digital advancements remained ‘key attraction’, offering delegates the opportunity to experience the transformative impact of Digital Public Infrastructure (DPIs) first hand. Seven key initiatives of Digital India have been selected to showcase in it, which one of the following is not one of them?
options: Aadhaar
eSanjeevani exhibit
UPI exhibit
Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC)
None of the above

quiz.text: India recently showcased its PM Gatishakti National Master Plan at the ‘2023 Regional Cooperation and Integration Conference: Strengthening Regional Cooperation and Integration through Economic Corridor Development (ECD)’, organized by _________. The venue of the conference was _________.
options: World Bank, New York
Asian Development Bank (ADB), Tbilisi
New Development Bank, Durban
Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank, Beijing
United Nations Conference on Trade and Development, Geneva

quiz.text: The Indian Prime Minister recently (Sep 2023) presented a 12-point proposal for strengthening _________ cooperation in areas like digital transformation, trade and economic engagement while addressing contemporary challenges like terrorism and deepening the strategic partnership.
options: BRICS
India-ASEAN
G20
India- European Union
India-Gulf Cooperation Council

quiz.text: The 1st part of Sagar Parikrama was launched on 5th March 2022 from Mandvi, __________ (Phase I) and completed on 12th June 2023 at Vizhinjam, Kerala (Phase VII) covering key areas on the west coast of the country. The 2nd part of Sagar Parikrama aims to cover the East coast of the country; hence _______ of Sagar Parikrama resumed recently (Sep 2023) from Vizhinjam, Kerala and will continue to cover the eastern coastal states of the country in subsequent phases.
options: Maharashtra, Phase - X
Gujarat, Phase - VIII
Maharashtra, Phase - VII
Karnataka, Phase - X
None of the above

quiz.text: REC Limited has recently (Sep 2023) signed a Foreign Currency Term Loan Agreement for USD 100 Million, with __________. The funds will be raised as part of REC's Market Borrowing Programme of Rs. 1.20 lakh crore for the year 2023-24. The loan has been tied up for a 5-year tenor and is benchmarked to________.
options: Reserve Bank of India, Secured Overnight Financing Rate (SOFR)
Asian Development Bank, External commercial borrowing Rate (ECBR)
HDFC Bank, London Interbank Offered Rate (LIBOR)
Export Import Bank of India (EXIM Bank), Secured Overnight Financing Rate (SOFR)
None of the above

quiz.text: The State Bank of India (SBI) has recently implemented Unified Payments Interface (UPI) interoperability in its digital rupee, called Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC). This feature is accessible through the ________ application. App enables SBI CBDC users to effortlessly scan any merchant UPI QR code for swift and secure transactions.
options: e-Rupee Yono
CBDC Yono
CBDC by SBI
eRupee by SBI
None of the above

quiz.text: By September 2023 several Indian Banks have implemented feature of interoperability of Unified Payments Interface (UPI) and Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC). Which one of the following bank is not one of them?
options: Yes Bank
HDFC Bank
Canara Bank
Axis Bank
Bank of India
